code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{Carousel,Image}from'react-bootstrap';import Loader from'./loader';import Message from'./message';import{topProducts}from'../Actions/productAction';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProductCarousel=function ProductCarousel(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var productTop=useSelector(function(state){return state.productTop;});var loading=productTop.loading,error=productTop.error,products=productTop.products;useEffect(function(){dispatch(topProducts());},[dispatch]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{}):error?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Message,{variant:"danger",children:error}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{pause:"hover",className:"bg-dark",children:products.map(function(product,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{src:product.image,alt:product.name,fluid:true,className:"d-block w-45"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Caption,{className:"carousel-caption",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[product.name," (\u20B9",product.price,") "]})})]})},index);})})})});};export default ProductCarousel;
